content.metaTitle: Villa Scorpio: Luxury 4-Bed Villa in Jávea from €1,285,000
content.metaDescription: Discover Villa Scorpio, an exclusive 4-bedroom luxury villa in prestigious Cap Martí, Jávea. Stunning pool, modern design, turnkey delivery. Contact us today!
content.heroIntro:
Nestled in the prestigious Cap Martí area of Jávea, Villa Scorpio represents the pinnacle of luxury Costa Blanca living. This exceptional 4-bedroom, 4-bathroom villa, masterfully crafted by renowned developer Miralbo Urbana, offers an unparalleled blend of contemporary elegance and Mediterranean charm, just moments from the region's most coveted beaches and world-class amenities.

Designed for the discerning buyer who appreciates both sophistication and functionality, this stunning 165m² residence features an expansive open-concept living space that seamlessly flows between indoor and outdoor areas. With its private swimming pool, lush terrace garden, and premium turnkey finishes including air conditioning, central heating, and advanced security systems, Villa Scorpio delivers the ultimate luxury lifestyle experience on Spain's golden coast.

locationSection.intro:
Cap Martí in Jávea represents one of the Costa Blanca's most exclusive residential enclaves, where pristine Mediterranean beaches meet rolling hills dotted with luxury villas. This coveted location offers the perfect balance of tranquil residential living and vibrant coastal culture, with the historic town center of Jávea just minutes away and easy access to both Alicante and Valencia airports.

The area is renowned for its exceptional quality of life, boasting year-round sunshine, crystal-clear waters, and a sophisticated international community. From world-class golf courses to Michelin-starred restaurants, premium marinas to exclusive beach clubs, Cap Martí provides an unmatched lifestyle proposition that attracts discerning residents from across Europe and beyond.
highlights: Walking distance to Arenal Beach, one of Spain's most beautiful sandy beaches
5 minutes to Jávea's charming historic town center and port
Proximity to prestigious golf courses including Javea Golf Club
Easy access to luxury marinas and exclusive beach clubs
30 minutes to Alicante airport with excellent international connections

propertyFeatures.intro: Villa Scorpio showcases exceptional attention to detail throughout its thoughtfully designed spaces, where premium materials and contemporary aesthetics create an atmosphere of refined luxury that's perfect for both relaxation and entertaining.
features: 4 spacious bedrooms with built-in wardrobes and natural light
4 modern bathrooms with premium fixtures and finishes
Open-concept living-dining area perfect for entertaining
Fully equipped contemporary kitchen with high-end appliances
Private swimming pool surrounded by landscaped terrace
Covered carport for two vehicles with additional storage
Pre-installed air conditioning and central heating systems
Advanced alarm system for complete security and peace of mind
Premium materials throughout reflecting Miralbo's commitment to quality
Turnkey delivery with all luxury amenities included

content.investmentSection:
The Costa Blanca luxury property market continues to demonstrate exceptional resilience and growth potential, with Jávea consistently ranking among the region's most sought-after destinations for international buyers. Villa Scorpio's prime location in Cap Martí, combined with its premium construction quality and turnkey specification, positions it as an outstanding investment opportunity with strong potential for capital appreciation.

With Spain's golden visa program attracting high-net-worth individuals and the region's growing reputation as a year-round destination, luxury properties in prime locations like this continue to command premium prices and generate excellent rental yields. The combination of lifestyle appeal, investment security, and potential EU residency benefits makes Villa Scorpio an compelling proposition for discerning investors seeking both personal enjoyment and financial returns.
whyBuySection: Exclusive location in prestigious Cap Martí with proximity to beaches and amenities
Turnkey luxury villa from renowned developer Miralbo Urbana with proven track record
Prime investment opportunity in one of Costa Blanca's most desirable areas
Modern design with premium materials and high-end finishes throughout
Private pool and landscaped outdoor spaces perfect for Mediterranean living
Excellent rental potential for holiday lets or long-term tenants
Potential pathway to Spanish residency through property investment

faqs.question: What is the total price for Villa Scorpio and are payment plans available?
faqs.answer: Villa Scorpio is priced at €1,285,000. We can discuss flexible payment structures during the buying process. Contact us for detailed payment options and financing assistance.

faqs.question: How close is the villa to beaches and local amenities?
faqs.answer: The villa is located in Cap Martí, just minutes from Arenal Beach and Jávea's town center. You'll have easy access to restaurants, shops, golf courses, and marina facilities within a short drive.

faqs.question: What does the property buying process involve for international buyers?
faqs.answer: We guide international buyers through every step, from initial viewing to completion. This includes NIE number assistance, legal support, bank account setup, and liaising with notaries for the final signing.

faqs.question: Can you help arrange mortgage financing for this property?
faqs.answer: Yes, we work with Habeno mortgage specialists who can arrange competitive financing options for international buyers. Spanish banks typically offer mortgages up to 70% of property value for non-residents.

faqs.question: What is the rental potential for this villa?
faqs.answer: Luxury villas in Jávea's premium locations generate excellent rental returns, particularly during peak season (May-October). The combination of location, amenities, and quality make this ideal for high-end holiday rentals.

faqs.question: When will Villa Scorpio be completed and ready for occupation?
faqs.answer: Please contact us for the latest completion timeline. Miralbo Urbana has an excellent track record for on-time delivery of their luxury developments.

faqs.question: What is included in the turnkey delivery?
faqs.answer: The villa comes fully finished with air conditioning, central heating, alarm system, fully equipped kitchen, landscaped gardens, and swimming pool. All luxury amenities are included for immediate move-in.

faqs.question: Can I arrange a viewing of Villa Scorpio?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We can arrange viewings of the development and show you the plans and specifications. Contact us via WhatsApp (+34 634 044 970) to schedule your private viewing.

content.conclusion: Villa Scorpio represents a rare opportunity to own a piece of paradise in one of Costa Blanca's most prestigious locations. With its combination of luxury, location, and investment potential, this exceptional property won't remain available for long. Contact us today via WhatsApp or call +34 634 044 970 to arrange your private viewing and take the first step toward your dream Mediterranean lifestyle.
